25 class CGuiComponentBase:

39  I_ASSIGN(m_defaultStatusIconPathAttrPtr, "DefaultStatusIcon", "Path of status icon used by default", false, "");
40  I_ASSIGN(m_defaultStatusTextAttrPtr, "DefaultStatusText", "Status text used by default", true, "");
41  I_ASSIGN(m_styleSheetPathAttrPtr, "StyleSheet", "Path to the style sheet file used for this UI component.", false, "");
42  I_ASSIGN(m_objectIdAttrPtr, "ObjectId", "ID of the widget", false, "");
43  I_ASSIGN(m_fixedWidthAttrPtr, "FixedWidth", "Fixed width of the widget", false, 300);
44  I_ASSIGN(m_fixedHeightAttrPtr, "FixedHeight", "Fixed height of the widget", false, 300);
